definition: to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: All radio programs are available on cassette format.
sentences.chinese: 所有的廣播節目都以盒帶形式發售。

sentences.english: He appeared on the radio show as part of tour to promote his book “Conventional Idiocy.
sentences.chinese: 他曾出現在一次廣播節目中宣傳他的書《傳統白癡》。

sentences.english: The World Service broadcasts programmes in English and 35 other languages all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 國際臺用英語和其他35種語言向全世界廣播節目。

sentences.english: His disgraceful radio programmes and the full blooming of his loopiness lie ahead.
sentences.chinese: 他可恥的廣播節目以及完全的瘋狂表現出來。

sentences.english: Yaël: So Don, did you always want to be a radio producer? Don.
sentences.chinese: 你一直想做廣播節目製作人嗎？

sentences.english: Ash is invited as a guest on a Goldenrod City radio program.
sentences.chinese: 粉煤灰是應邀作爲嘉賓的一枝黃花市的廣播節目。

sentences.english: Let us take the broadcast on tape .
sentences.chinese: 咱們把這個廣播節目錄到磁帶上。

sentences.english: He has made several broadcasts of poetry and short stories.
sentences.chinese: 他做過幾次詩歌和短故事的廣播節目。

sentences.english: News and wether forecast are the major part for broadcast programmes .
sentences.chinese: 新聞和天氣預報是廣播節目中的主要內容。

sentences.english: She dialled into the opera broadcast.
Each network would be responsible for a third of the telecasts.
sentences.chinese: 每個廣播網都負責提供三分之一的電視廣播節目。

sentences.english: Listening to English teaching radio programs can help you improve your English.
sentences.chinese: 聽英語教學廣播節目能夠幫助你提高英文。

sentences.english: In nineteen ninety-three, she created the radio program Tech Nation.
sentences.chinese: 在九三年，她創造了廣播節目技術的國家。

sentences.english: The spokesman made the announcement in a broadcast on state radio.
sentences.chinese: 這名發言人在國家電臺的廣播節目中宣佈了該決定。

dummy run/to run through sth/to rehearse
(Tw) teacher in charge of a class/homeroom teacher
